channel.title: Utah County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Utah County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 284 and 283
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 284 - UT-92/Timpanogos Highway. Approaching Exit 283 - Triumph Blvd.

item.title: End US-189 South at I-15
item.description: US-189 South at I-15 North to Salt Lake City. Approaching ramp for I-15 South to Las Vegas (Nevada) and Lakeview Parkway. Use left lane to continue south on University Ave./To Lakeview Parkway. This is the southern end of US-189.

item.title: US-189 South Approaching UT-52/To I-15
item.description: US-189 South approaching UT-52/To I-15 to Orem. Continue south on US-189 for Provo.

item.title: US-189 South at UT-92
item.description: US-189 South at UT-92 in Utah County

item.title: US-6 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 east. Distance to Price, I-70 Junction, and Grand Junction (Colorado).

item.title: End UT-96 at US-6
item.description: End UT-96 at US-6 in Utah County. Use US-6 West for Provo; US-6 East for Price.

item.title: End UT-96 at US-6
item.description: End UT-96 at US-6 in Utah County.

item.title: End UT-96 at US-6
item.description: End UT-96 at US-6 in Utah County.

item.title: End UT-194 East at I-15
item.description: End UT-194 East at I-15 south to Las Vegas (Nevada). West 2100 North continues into Lehi.

item.title: UT-68 South Approaching UT-194 East
item.description: UT-68 South approaching UT-194 East (W 2100 North). UT-194 north is an expressway connection between UT-68 and I-15 in Lehi. It will eventually connect to the Mountain View Corridor.

item.title: US-6 West - Bergen Jct.
item.description: US-6 West at Bergen Jct. Continue west on US-6 for National Historic Area/Tintic Mining District.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Eureka and Delta.

item.title: End UT-68 South at US-6
item.description: End UT-68 south at US-6 in Elberta. Turn right on US-6 west for Eureka and Delta.

item.title: End UT-68 South at US-6
item.description: End UT-68 south at US-6 in Elberta. Turn right on US-6 west for Eureka and Delta.

item.title: End UT-68 South at US-6
item.description: End UT-68 South at US-6 in Elberta.

item.title: UT-68 South at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing)
item.description: UT-68 South at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing). Turn right on UT-145 for access to UT-73.

item.title: UT-68 South at West 8570 North to Lehi
item.description: UT-68 South at West 8570 North to Lehi. Continue south on UT-68 to Elberta.

item.title: UT-68 South at West 8750 North
item.description: UT-68 South at West 8750 North to Cedar Fort, Eagle Mountain, and Camp Floyd State Park and Museum.

item.title: UT-68 South at UT-85 South to I-15
item.description: UT-68 South at UT-85 South to I-15. This stretch of UT-85 between UT-68 and I-15 at Lehi is the southern part of the Mountain View Corridor.

item.title: UT-68 (Redwood Road) South/UT-85 South
item.description: UT-68 (Redwood Road) South/UT-85 South at the north end of the expressway section of UT-85 between I-15 and UT-68. Continue south on UT-68/UT-85 for the southbound expressway.

item.title: UT-68 South - Utah County
item.description: Entering Utah County on UT-68 south.

item.title: UT-68 North/UT-85 West - Camp Williams Exits
item.description: UT-68 North/UT-85 West - Camp Williams Exits. Camp Williams exits are Main Gate, Truck Gate, and Veterans Cemetery.

item.title: UT-68 North/UT-85 West - Lehi
item.description: UT-68 North/UT-85 West in Lehi

item.title: UT-68 North/UT-85 West - Mountain View
item.description: UT-68 North/UT-85 West - UT-85/Mountain View (Corridor) - 3.5 miles north.

item.title: UT-68 North at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing)
item.description: UT-68 North at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing) in Saratoga Springs. Use UT-145 west to UT-73; UT-145 east to I-15.

item.title: UT-68 North approaching UT-145
item.description: UT-68 North approaching UT-145 in Saratoga Springs.

item.title: US-6 West at UT-68 North
item.description: US-6 West at UT-68 North to Salt Lake City. Continue west on US-6 for Delta.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching UT-68
item.description: US-6 West approaching UT-68 north in Elberta.

item.title: US-6 West - UT-141 Jct.
item.description: US-6 West approaching UT-141 Jct. in Genola.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6. Distance to Genola, Goshen, and Delta.

item.title: US-6 West - Santaquin
item.description: US-6 West in Santaquin

item.title: US-6 West at I-15 South (Exit 244)
item.description: US-6 West at I-15 South (Exit 244) in Santaquin. Use I-15 south for Las Vegas, NV.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 244 Offramp at US-6 West
item.description: I-15 North - Exit 244 Offramp at US-6 West. Turn left on US-6 west for Santaquin, Eureka, and Delta.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 244
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 244 - US-6 West/Main St. US-6 joins I-15 northbound to Spanish Fork. This interchange used to be labeled US-6 West/Santaquin.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 242
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 242 - Summit Ridge Parkway. This interchange was recently renamed from South Santaquin.

item.title: I-15 North - Exits 257A-B
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 257A-B - US-6 West/UT-156/Spanish Fork/Main St./Price. US-6 leaves I-15 northbound at this interchange.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 244
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 244 - US-6 West/Main St. US-6 joins I-15 northbound to Spanish Fork.

item.title: I-15 North - Utah County
item.description: Entering Utah County on I-15 northbound. Utah County is the southern part of the Salt Lake City metropolitan area. Provo is the county seat of Utah County.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 242
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 242 - Summit Ridge Parkway. This interchange was recently renamed from South Santaquin.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 263
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 263 - US-189 North/University Avenue.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching I-15
item.description: US-6 west approaching I-15. Merge right for I-15 north towards Salt Lake. Continue ahead for I-15 South/US-6 West for Las Vegas (Nevada). US-6 west joins I-15 south to Santiquin.

item.title: US-6 West at I-15
item.description: US-6 west at I-15 in Spanish Fork. Use I-15 north for Salt Lake; use I-15 South/US-6 West for Las Vegas (Nevada). US-6 joins I-15 south to Santiquin.

item.title: US-6 West - Freeway Entrance
item.description: Freeway Entrance on US-6 west approaching I-15.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching I-15
item.description: US-6 west approaching I-15 onramps. Notice the the I-15 shield inside the I-15 Jct. big green sign has the word Utah in it. There are a few of these shields around the Provo area that appear to be newly posted.

item.title: US-6 West at UT-198
item.description: UT-6 west at UT-198.

item.title: US-6 West/US-89 North Approaching Split
item.description: US-6 West/US-89 North approaching US-89/US-6 split. Continue west on US-6 for I-15 junction. The I-15 shield contains the word Utah. This is one of the many I-15 shields in the Provo area that have the word Utah in it.

item.title: US-6 West/US-89 At US-6/US-89 Split
item.description: US-6 West/US-89 at US-6/US-89 split. Turn right for US-89 north to Springville and Mapleton. Continue west on US-6 towards Salt Lake City and Provo.

item.title: US-6 West at US-89
item.description: US-6 west at US-89 junction. Turn left for US-89 south to Manti, and Fairview. Continue west on US-6/US-89 North towards Spanish Fork. US-89 joins US-6 through Spanish Fork Canyon.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching US-89
item.description: US-6 west approaching US-89. Turn left for US-89 south; continue ahead for US-89 North/US-6 West. US-89 joins US-6 west through Spanish Fork Canyon.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching US-89
item.description: US-6 west approaching US-89.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-6 west. Distance to I-15, Provo, and Salt Lake City.

item.title: US-6 West at UT-96
item.description: US-6 west at UT-96 south. UT-96 is part of the Energy Loop Byway.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching UT-96
item.description: US-6 west approaching UT-96 to Scofield and Fairview. Continue west on US-6 for Salt Lake City.

item.title: US-6 East at UT-96
item.description: US-6 East at UT-96 south in rural Utah County.

item.title: US-6 East/US-89 South at US-89 South
item.description: US-6 East/US-89 South at US-89 South split. Turn right for US-89 south to Mt Pleasant, Ephriam, and Manti.

item.title: US-6 East/US-89 South at US-89 South
item.description: US-6 East/US-89 South at US-89 South split in Utah County.

item.title: US-6 East/US-89 South Approaching Split
item.description: US-6 East/US-89 South Approaching US-6/US-89 split in Utah County.

item.title: US-6 East at US-89
item.description: US-6 East at US-89. US-89 joins US-6 east up Spanish Fork Canyon.

item.title: US-6 East Approaching US-89
item.description: US-6 East approaching US-89. Use US-89 north for Mapleton and Springville. Continue ahead on US-6 east/US-89 south for Price.

item.title: US-6 East at UT-198
item.description: US-6 East at UT-198. The windmills in the background are part of the Spanish Fork Wind Project.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 282
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 282 - 1200 West.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 279
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 279 - Lehi/Main St.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 278
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 278 - American Fork/Main St.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 276
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 276 - 500 East.

item.title: I-15 North - American Fork Exits
item.description: American Fork Exits on I-15 north - 500 East and Main St.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 275
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 275 - Pleasant Grove/American Fork.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 273
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 273 - 1600 North.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 272
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 272 - UT-52/To US-189/8th North.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 271
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 271 - Orem/Center St.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 269
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 269 - UT-265/University Parkway.

item.title: I-15 North - Orem Exits
item.description: Orem Exits on I-15 north - University Parkway, Center St., 800 North.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 265A and Exit 265B
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 265A - Eastbound Provo Center St. Approaching Exit 265B - UT-114 West/Airport.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 263
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 263 - US-189 North/University Ave./1860 South. This is the southern end of US-189.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 261
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 261 - UT-75/Springville/Provo.

item.title: I-15 North - Provo Exits
item.description: Next 3 Provo Exits on I-15 north - UT-75, University Ave., and Center St.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 260
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 260 - UT-77/Springville.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 257
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 257 - US-6 East/Spanish Fork/Price. US-6 leaves I-15 north here.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 253
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 253 - UT-164/Spanish Fork.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 250
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 250 - UT-115/Payson/Benjamin.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 248
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 248 - Payson/Salem.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 244
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 244 - US-6 West/Santaquin. US-6 joins I-15 north to Spanish Fork.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 242
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 242 - South Santaquin.
